name: 2048 Solitaire
description:
Thank You!

Support me on Patreon and help make the games you've always wanted to play.

How to Play

Simply drag-and-drop cards. Matching cards combine. Try to create a card with the value 2048. You can discard up to two card per game.

You can use the 1, 2, 3, and 4 keys on your keyboard, as an alternative to click-and-dragging.
